TopicTitle: How many forum moderators does it take to change a lightbulb?

Articles.Content:
A: We don\'t know yet - They\'re still waiting for the lightbulb to send back an activation email... ;P

oh snap! But seriously, does it really take over 72 hours to activate an account??

Just kidding, top game guys! This is the game that Spore should have been but wasn\'t!

So I was going to report a bug I found in 0.14 x4 before the next release, but apparently that\'s old news now. We\'re all staring at the lightbulb now in a calm hypnotic trance.

In the meantime I just need to test posting an image before posting my bug (if it still exists)
Welcome to the forums! feel free to explain what bug you\'ve been facing at the development forum.

Welcome to the KSP Forums!

Accounts usually get the activation email sent right away automatically. It\'s possible the your email got caught in the spammer check and had to be manually approved. Since no one was in the office this weekend that checks the accounts, it didn\'t get done until after the weekend. We get anywhere from 4-8 attempts per hour of spammers using automated tools to create accounts. This makes for a very big list to scan every Monday.

Happy Launching!

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky

KSP Community Manager
